item.description:
Don’t miss out on your chance to taste some of the area’s gourmet cuisine on wheels at the Boston Food Truck Festival at the UMass Boston Campus Center. The festival will take place from noon to 4 pm, with a special VIP hour from 11am – noon.

Come early, come hungry!

Tickets are on sale now at http://foodtruckfestivalsofne.com/buy-tickets/

I bought the VIP ticket so will begin eating at 11 AM but will check in for regular folk at noon at the registration area.

Each ticket allows one serving from each of the participating food trucks but does not include beverages.

Ticket Prices:
VIP Tickets - $40/each (limited quantity)  Early Entry 11 AM
General Admission - $30/each ($35 at the gate)
Foodie Four Pack - $25/each with the purchase of four tickets ($100 for four pack)
Children 6 -12 - $10/each
Children 5 and under - FREE

BUY your ticket NOW. They may not be available at the event

EAT EAT EAT DRINK DRINK DRINK BE MERRY MERRY MERRY

Share your experience by taking the event survey or posting a message after.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the check in area at noon. I will be wearing an orange plastic peace sign bead necklace.

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Food Truck Festival Extravaganza
